entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 14 March 2023
